name: kutty
description: Kutty is a tailwind plugin for building web applications. It has a set of accessible and reusable components that are commonly used in web applications.
author: praveenjuge

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss docs/main.css -o docs/static/build.css --watch --verbose --no-map" "cd docs && hugo server --disableFastRender" "rollup -c -w"
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss docs/main.css -o docs/static/build.css --verbose && rollup --compact --config rollup-prod.config.js && cd docs && hugo --minify
